evening:
Today night we went to the new years eve buffet and it had many many delicious 
Cakes and dishes, we where all amazed by how much detail all the chefs put into there food.there was a small concert and they sung amazing western songs with a Vietnamese’s twist there was also women doing cultural dances.later that night I decided to go to bed and sleep instead of waiting until midnight, although it was very hard to sleep since the music was VERY loud.
title: New Year’s Eve
